headline: Quick and Easy Baked Buffalo Chicken Dip
description: Traditional Buffalo chicken dip is quick and easy when you bake it in the oven; serve while you watch the big game or as an appetizer!
name: Quick and Easy Baked Buffalo Chicken Dip
recipeIngredient: 0.75 cup hot sauce (such as Frank's RedHot Â®)
4 fully cooked chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a baking dish.

Beat cream cheese, hot sauce, 1/2 cup pepper Jack cheese, and blue cheese dressing together in a large bowl; fold in chicken until completely coated. Pour mixture into the prepared baking dish and top with crumbled blue cheese and 1/3 cup pepper Jack cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and dip is bubbling up the sides, 15 to 20 minutes.

review.reviewBody: This is a great easy recipe and always a Big Hit !
Very quick and easy to make! Served about 12 with left overs!
I used ranch dressing and cheddar cheese since that's what I had on hand. Loved it!

Delicious. But like others, felt the bleu cheese dressing would be too much. Used Ranch instead. Just right. The crumbled bleu cheese on top is enough. Very rich. Maybe some chopped green onions next time? Tortilla chips or plain crackers were the favorites.
I used cheddar cheese instead of pepper jack. It's so good. Love it!

End up making this dish for a Christmas party with friends. It came out perfect. I did change the recipe a little though. Instead of using blue cheese dressing i used ranch dressing and just kept the blue cheese for the crumble for the top of the dish. Doing so made this dish Perfect! I also used franks hot sauce for buffalo wings, not just hot sauce. Would for sure make this dish again with my little changes to it! Everyone thought it was so good! it was perfect it didn't have to much of a hot kick to it which was nice, just the right amount.

I was excited to try this b/c it's different than our usual favorite, and we LOVED it! I really liked the use of the pepper jack instead of cheddar and the blue cheese just put this over the top. I did half the recipe, and that was the perfect amount for us. I will def be making this one again and again~YUM! Thanks for sharing. :)

item.name: Quick and Easy Baked Buffalo Chicken Dip
